channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- System x
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- System x

item.title: CVE-2020-8332|2024-08-04T09:56:28.331Z -- ibm -- system%20x
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the legacy BIOS mode USB drivers in some legacy Lenovo and IBM System x servers may allow arbitrary code execution. Servers operating in UEFI mode are not affected.
